en: #NAME, you promised you would go rock-climbing with me tonight! I know you're tired, but you always keep your promises. Are you ready to go?
none::Despite your exhaustion, you go rock climbing with Skylar. It pushes you over the edge, and you feel scattered the next day. You don't get much done.
none::Skylar sighs and leaves. You tell yourself you're in the right and ignore the niggling doubt in the back of your mind.
